title: What are some ways to not get tilted?
body:
Well I am a silver 4 player currently and I usually do pretty well but I find myself losing because my teams feed horribly. After this I always get tilted and I have to take a break from the game. 

I was wondering if there are any good tips on how not to get tilted so I can play more and possibly climb faster.

replies.body: A few tips. /muteall. don't play when tilted. don't tilt to begin with! Don't worry about KDA. Play relaxation games in your downtime. Learn to master your champion. Learn to carry. Don't worry so much about climbing and winning; if you get good enough, you'll climb naturally.
I suspect chill vs tilt is more of an ingrained character trait.  The only reliable way to change is Jesus.
Type /muteall at the beginning of every game, at least ranked ones. Just try it out for like 10 games, and I guarantee you won't stop doing it ever again.

stop caring 

just try to play and have fun... just do the best you can do and realize the only thing you can control is your actions

Realize that this is a meaningless game that has absolutely no impact on your life even though most people pretend their ingame success validates them as people.
Just learn to laugh when your blitzcrank misses his flash hook rather than scream in rage.
